extension.summary: SageTV: Browse and manage airings and recordings
extension.description:
Allows you to connect to your SageTV server where you can browse and view recordings, view and manage your upcoming recordings, browse channel listings, and search for airings and recordings.
Dependencies: SageTV with: Jetty Web Server 2.3.0.14 or newer Sagex-api vs 7.1.9.10 or newer Batch Metadata Tools 4.10.1 xbmc.js (Copy xbmc.js from "plugin.video.sagetv\extras\sagex\services" to your "SageTV\SageTV\sagex\services" directory)
